scripts.predeploy: npm run build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('docs', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.cpSync('out', 'docs', { recursive: true }); fs.writeFileSync('docs/.nojekyll', '');"
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && git add -f docs && git commit -m "chore: deploy site" && git push -f origin main
